docs.title: Untitled Ontology
docs.text:
This ontology defines concepts related to traffic regulations using concepts specified in ISO/IEC 5087-1 and ISO/IEC-5087-2.

This ontology consists of the following patterns:

  • Location Pattern
  • Time Pattern
  • Tro Pattern

The formal definition of these patterns is available in OWL Functional Notation.

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition areaLocation exactly 1 AreaLocation None rdfs:subClassOf Destination ---

docs.title: LegalBasis
docs.text:
A legal basis provides references to the legal documents that authorize an entity to issue the types of regulations covered by a traffic regulation order.

Open interactive LegalBasis diagram

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition date max 1 xsd:date None date only xsd:date None genProp:hasName exactly 1 xsd:string None genProp:hasName only xsd:string None rdfs:subClassOf TroThing --- version max 1 xsd:string None version only xsd:string None

docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition locationContainedInGroup min 2 Location None locationContainedInGroup only Location None rdfs:subClassOf LocationGroup ---

docs.title: Location Pattern
docs.text:
It consists of the following classes:

  • Area Destination
  • Area Location
  • Destination
  • Indexed Location
  • Itinerary
  • Itinerary By Indexed Locations
  • Jurisdictional Entity
  • Linear Location
  • Location
  • Location Group
  • Location Group By List
  • Location Reference
  • Location Thing
  • Named Area
  • Network Location
  • Point Coordinates
  • Point Destination
  • Point Location
  • Position Confidence Ellipse
  • Supplementary Positional Description

docs.title: Time Pattern
docs.text:
It consists of the following classes:

  • Day Selector
  • Instance Of Day Within Month
  • Overall Period
  • Period
  • Public Holiday
  • Special Day
  • Time Period Of Day
  • Time Thing
  • Validity

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition endTimeOfPeriod exactly 1 xsd:time None endTimeOfPeriod only xsd:time None rdfs:subClassOf TimeThing --- startTimeOfPeriod exactly 1 xsd:time None startTimeOfPeriod only xsd:time None

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition rdfs:subClassOf transportnetwork:ITSThing ---

docs.title: TrafficRegulation
docs.text:
A traffic regulation is a rule having the force of law that is established by a regulator through a traffic regulation order.

Open interactive TrafficRegulation diagram

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition rdfs:subClassOf TroThing ---

docs.title: TrafficRegulationOrder
docs.text:
A TrafficRegulation Order is a legally recognised document that specifies one or more traffic regulations.

Open interactive TrafficRegulationOrder diagram

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition genProp:hasDescription max 1 xsd:string None genProp:hasDescription only xsd:string None genProp:hasIdentifier exactly 1 xsd:string None genProp:hasIdentifier only xsd:string None implementedValidity max 1 Validity None implementedValidity only Validity None legalBasis max 1 LegalBasis formal authority within the law (e.g., statute, ordinance, administrative rule, constitutional provision) that empowers an entity to create, adopt, or enforce a regulation legalBasis only LegalBasis formal authority within the law (e.g., statute, ordinance, administrative rule, constitutional provision) that empowers an entity to create, adopt, or enforce a regulation rdfs:subClassOf TroThing --- reasonCode only code:Code A reason justifying the existence of the instance of the class status exactly 1 code:Code The status of the instance of the containing class status only code:Code The status of the instance of the containing class trafficRegulation min 1 TrafficRegulation None trafficRegulation only TrafficRegulation None validityByOrder max 1 Validity None validityByOrder only Validity None

docs.title: Tro Pattern
docs.text:
It consists of the following classes:

  • Legal Basis
  • Traffic Regulation
  • Traffic Regulation Order
  • Tro Thing

docs.title: Formalization
docs.text: Property Value Restriction Definition rdfs:subClassOf transportnetwork:ITSThing ---
